During the analysis of my latest generation of machines, I noticed that they often won't use the best way of crafting, or that they waste material remains
Through minimal adaptations of their program, I made it so they can analyse and document their own efficiency. The data created in that way are stored as "Support"-points inside the machine.
I can probably evaluate the gathered data sets of these "intelligently" working machines in my own further research, or use them to create even more intelligent machinery.
If supplied with Support-points, I can also use the assembly table to build considerably better components.

Info: The Supportgauge is (most of the time) on the right-hand side of machinery GUI's, and is yellow-colored. Information regarding transport and storage of such points can be found on the "logistics"-page.
